#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define FOR(a, b, i) for (int i = a; i < b; ++i)

typedef vector<int> VI;
typedef vector<VI> VVI;

int main() {
  cout.setf(ios::fixed);
  cout.precision(7);
  int test;
  cin >> test;
  while (test--) {
    double n;
    cin >> n;
    cout << 100 * pow(n + 1, -1.0 / n) << '\n';
  }
}
